title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7901.4 - What to file
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7901.4 - What to file

State Regulations
(a) An
application for assignment from the State set-aside system may be made by
filing a written application under subdivision (b) of this section, or by
making an oral, including telephonic, request to the State Energy Office. Any
person making an oral request for assignment shall file a written application
under subdivision (b) of this section within five days after making the oral
request. (b) A written application
for assignment shall be made on forms to be provided by the State Energy

Office. An application shall include all information required on such forms, and shall be signed and dated by the applicant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7901.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
